content:
# The stone patch is indeed available and has a substantial size of 28,981, indicating that there should be plenty of stone to harvest.
# However, since I received an error when attempting to harvest, it might be due to my current position or the way I'm trying to harvest.

# I will try to harvest a smaller quantity of stone this time, perhaps starting with just 5 units to see if that works.
harvested_stone = harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=5)
print(f'Attempting to harvest {5} stone from the patch.')
print(f"Inventory updated to: {inspect_inventory()}")
